thread.section_title: Serenity Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Serenity Insurance | serenitygroup.com
thread.title: Bertie Guerra
thread.title_full: Serenity Insurance reviewed by Bertie Guerra

author: Bertie Guerra
title: Bertie Guerra
text: I am at the moment trying to re-instate my license. I thought it was going to be full of red tape. Craig helped me get the insurance I needed and at a great super low price. I will recommend this insurance company to all my friends. It was easy, and above all, stress free. Thank You, Bertie.
